Dream Keeper

Virtual Reality (WebVR)

Dream Keeper is a personalized, immersive website in which to place your memories and dreams. So much time is spent these days on throw away social media. Who remembers what they posted last month? Or last week for that matter. Dream keeper is an evolution of the photo album, where you can display photos and videos in a 3D virtual reality environment custom created to your liking. A modern website for thoughts and experiences you want to keep.

WebVR is an open technology that brings virutal reality to the browser. Dream Keeper is powered by WebVR, which means you will be able to access your site from any number of compatible devices from Android and Google smartphones to the Occulus Rift, HTC Vive, and much more. See WebVR's site for a complete listing of approved devices and browsers. Basically, Dream Keeper lives on the web will be accessible by almost any VR technology.

VR technology is changing rapidly, Dream Keeper is dynamic and fully upgradable. Currently, we are developing networking ability to allow you to hang out with your friends in your Dream Keeper space with further plans including augmented reality support and custom avatar creation. Contact me for a demo and more information.
